title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 12
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 12
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Trade Desk (TTD). Trade Desk Inc.'s shares rose to a record after the provider of online-advertising technology reported first-quarter earnings. The company had a profit of 18 cents a share rather than just breaking even, as analysts in a Bloomberg survey expected on average. Revenue beat the average projection by 23 percent.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
